    ojc.ahni.hyperneat  

    • Uses of HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN in ojc.ahni.hyperneat

      Methods in ojc.ahni.hyperneat with parameters of type HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void ESHyperNEATTranscriberBain.pruneAndExpress(HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN cppn, Point neuron, java.util.List<ESHyperNEATTranscriberBain.TempConnection> connections, ESHyperNEATTranscriberBain.QuadPoint root, boolean outgoing, double[] tempStorageForCPPNValues)
      The given quadtree is traversed depth-first until the current node's variance is smaller than the variance threshold or until the node has no children (which means that the variance is zero).
      ESHyperNEATTranscriberBain.QuadPoint ESHyperNEATTranscriberBain.quadTreeInitialisation(HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN cppn, Point n, boolean outgoing, double[] tempStorageForCPPNValues)
      Creates a quadtree by recursively subdividing the initial square, which spans the space from (-1, -1) to (1, 1), until a desired initial resolution is reached.
